mn21:8.4: ojāpaharaṇiyo → ojasāraṇiyo (sya-all); ojaharaṇiyo (mr) | chetvā → tacchetvā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn21:9.16: Na khvayye → na kho ayye (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn21:10.6: dhammaṃ mānento, dhammaṃ pūjento, dhammaṃ apacāyamāno → dhammaṃyeva sakkaronto dhammaṃ garukaronto dhammaṃ apacāyamāno (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn21:12.4: vikhaṇeyya → khaṇeyya (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed); khaneyya (sya1ed, sya2ed)
